sim_algo.title: Sim Algorithm
sim_algo.description: xor, milenage or tuak. Set the USIM authentication algorithm.

plmn.title: PLMN
plmn.description: Public Land Mobile Network, composed of MCC and MNC

msin.title: MSIN
msin.description: Mobile Subscriber Identification Number. Must not exceed 10 digits if PLMN has 5 digits, or 9 digits if PLMN has 6 digits.

opc.title: OPC
opc.description: Operator key preprocessed with the user secret key (as a 16 byte hexadecimal string).

amf.title: AMF
amf.description: Range: 0 to 65535. Set the Authentication Management Field.

sqn.title: SQN
sqn.description: Optional String (6 byte hexadecimal string). Set the initial sequence number. For the XOR algorithm, the actual value does not matter. For the Milenage or TUAK algorithm, a sequence number resynchronization is initiated if the sequence number does not match the one stored in the USIM.

k.title: K
k.description: Set the user secret key (as a 16 bytes hexadecimal string, or eventually 32 bytes hexadecimal string for TUAK).

impu.title: IMPU
impu.description: sip URI or a telephone number. Note that sip URI must not include hostname. If IMPU does not start by a scheme, it is assumed to be a sip URI.

impi.title: IMPI
impi.description: Defines user IMPI. Must be fully filled with hostname if necessary.

authent_type.title: Authentication Type
authent_type.description: Defines minimum authentication level. If client does no specify authentication algo, server will use this value. Else, server will allow authentication only if client provided algo is at least the one specified by this parameter.

multi_sim.title: Enable multi-sim (experimental)
multi_sim.description: Set to true to enable multi-SIM support

enable_multicast.title: Enable IPv4 multicast
enable_multicast.description: Set to true to enable IPv4 multicast

enable_ipv6_multicast.title: Enable IPv6 multicast
enable_ipv6_multicast.description: Set to true to enable IPv6 multicast

enable_broadcast.title: Enable IPv4 broadcast
enable_broadcast.description: Set to true to enable IPv4 broadcast
